about_the_game:
A once-thriving world is now a wasteland of corporate greed and environmental decay. Buildings are abandoned, forests became toxic wastelands, and the remnants of society fight over scraps. Explore diverse zones, from abandoned urban sprawls to deep wilderness areas, each filled with danger, secrets, and valuable loot.

Loot, Shoot, and Extract

  • High-Stakes Raids: Venture into hostile zones to scavenge for resources, weapons, and gear. Every raid is a gamble—extract with your loot to keep it, or lose everything if you fall.

  • Gun Modding: Customize your arsenal with a deep weapon modding system. Attachments, ammo types, and modifications can turn a basic rifle into a precision instrument of survival.

  • Dynamic Encounters: Face off against scavengers, corporate mercenaries, and enemy factions in tense, unpredictable firefights.

Base Progression

  • Rebuild and Upgrade: Between raids, return to your home base—a sanctuary in the chaos. Upgrade facilities like workshops, medical bays, and armories to gain permanent bonuses, craft better gear, and improve your chances of survival.

  • Recruit Survivors: Find and recruit NPCs with unique skills to bolster your base and provide passive benefits during raids.

RPG Meets Extraction Shooter

  • Character Progression: Level up your character and unlock powerful skills and abilities tailored to your playstyle. Whether you prefer stealth, brute force, or tactical precision, Last Extract offers a variety of builds to experiment with.

  • Loot with Meaning: Every piece of gear you find has the potential to change your playthrough. Legendary weapons, rare mods, and unique artifacts can turn the tide in your favor.

name: Last Extract

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: May struggle on older hardware
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD

short_description: Last Extract is a brutal extraction looter set in a collapsing world ruled by greed. Scavenge, shoot, and survive in a blend of hand crafted and procedural generated landscapes. In a broken society, survival is the only currency.
